trans-unit.source: Represents a control that allows the user to select a single item from a drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en kontroll som tillater at brukeren velger ett enkelt element fra en rullegardinliste.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction Use the DropDownList control to create a single-selection drop-down list control.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#Introduction) - [tilgjengelighet](#Accessibility) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduksjon Bruk DropDownList kontrollen til å opprette en enkel merking rullegardinlisten-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance of the DropDownList control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderWidth%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere utseendet til DropDownList-kontroll ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderStyle%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderWidth%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the items that you want to appear in the DropDownList control, place a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the DropDownList control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi elementene som skal vises i DropDownList kontrollen, kan du plassere et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>objekt for hver oppføring mellom innledende og avsluttende koder kontrollens DropDownList.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>

trans-unit.source: The DropDownList control also supports data binding.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen DropDownList støtter også databinding.

trans-unit.source: To bind the control to a data source, create a data source, such as a <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> object, that contains the items to display in the control.
trans-unit.target: For å binde kontrollen til en datakilde, kan du opprette en datakilde, for eksempel en <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>-objektet som inneholder elementer som skal vises i kontrollen.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Then, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to bind the data source to the DropDownList control.
trans-unit.target: Deretter bruker de <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å binde datakilden til DropDownList-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.SelectedIndex%2A> property to programmatically determine the index of the item selected by the user from the DropDownList control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.SelectedIndex%2A>til å fastslå programmatisk indeksen for elementet som er valgt av brukeren fra DropDownList-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index can then be used to retrieve the selected item from the `Items` collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen kan deretter brukes til å hente det valgte elementet fra den `Items` samling av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ## Tilgjengelighet For informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer denne kontrollen, slik at den genererer markup som overholder tilgjengelighet standarder se [tilgjengelighet i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```              ```
trans-unit.target: ## Deklarerende syntaks.```              ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>

trans-unit.source: Adds HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til HTML-attributter og stiler som skal gjengis til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> class.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når det avledes en egendefinert kontroll fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream that renders HTML contents to the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer utdata dataflyten som gjengir HTML-innhold til klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjefargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the border color of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer kantlinjefargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller Angir kantlinjestilen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjetykkelsen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> that represents the border width for the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref> som representerer kantlinjetykkelse for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection to store child controls.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en samling skal kunne lagres underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Always returns an <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid en <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes postback data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Prosesser tilbake dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page framework tracks all the server controls that return `true` from this method call, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET siden framework sporer alle serverkontroller returnere `true` fra metodekallet, og deretter aktiverer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>-metoden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index within the posted collection that references the content to load.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i samlingen postede som refererer til innholdet for å laste inn.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen verdiområde all innkommende navnet på serveren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"></xref> control's state changes as a result of the postback event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"> </xref> kontrollens tilstandsendringer som et resultat av hendelsen sende tilbake; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"></xref> control when postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer hendelser for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"> </xref> kontrollerer når tilbakesending forekommer.

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page framework calls the RaisePostDataChangedEvent method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.LoadPostData%2A> method indicates that the state of the list items has changed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET siden framework kaller RaisePostDataChangedEvent-metoden på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.LoadPostData%2A>metoden indikerer at tilstanden til elementene er endret i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.LoadPostData%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall RaisePostDataChangedEvent den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>metode til å øke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to perform custom processing when the user selects items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere kan overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>metode til å utføre egendefinerte behandling når brukeren velger elementer i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for det valgte elementet i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedIndex property to programmatically specify or determine the index of the selected item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SelectedIndex-egenskapen til å angi programmatisk eller fastslå indeksen for det valgte elementet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>

trans-unit.source: An item is always selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: Et element alltid i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>

trans-unit.source: You cannot clear the selection from every item in the list at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke fjerne utvalget fra hvert element i listen samtidig.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The indexes for the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control are zero-based.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Indekser for elementene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>kontrollen er nullbasert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>

trans-unit.source: The index of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for det valgte elementet i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0, which selects the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0, som velges det første elementet i listen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref> attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen skal angi den <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""> </xref> attributtet i det gjengitte HTML-elementet til "deaktivert" når kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir hvordan ASP.NET skal gjengi HTML for en kontroll når kontrollen er deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er `true`, ASP.NET gjengir en `disabled` attributt når en kontroll er deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er `false`, ASP.NET gjengir en `class` attributt når en kontroll er deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than `4.0`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen angir en ASP.NET-versjonen som er lavere enn `4.0`; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes posted data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Prosesser lagt ut data for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The key value used to index an entry in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelverdien brukes til å indeksere en oppføring i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that contains post information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om post.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the posted content is different from the last posting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis postede innholdet, er forskjellig fra den siste posteringen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"></xref> control on postback.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer hendelser for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"> </xref> kontrollen i tilbakesending.

trans-unit.source: Always throws an <xref href="System.Web.HttpException"></xref> exception because multiple selection is not supported for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Alltid oppstår en <xref href="System.Web.HttpException"> </xref> unntak fordi flervalg ikke støttes for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control does not support multiple selections and throws an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>kontrollen støtter ikke flere valgene og kaster en <xref:System.Web.HttpException>unntak.</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: I alle tilfeller.
